item.title: Voting Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

hey, i have this voting command that works, but when a player types in ::vote it opens up on all the players screens, how can i make it that it only opens up for the 1 person that types in ::vote heres the command

if (playerCommand.equals(“vote”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.getPA().sendFrame126(“www.google.com”, 12000);
}
Rep++ if you know how
